meanings.sent1: China is known for its rich history and culture.
meanings.sent2: I would love to visit China one day and explore the Great Wall.
meanings.sent3: Why did the panda bring bamboo to China? To have a bamboo-tiful meal!
meanings.sent4: Her love for China blossomed like a cherry tree in spring.
meanings.sent5: The dragon dance at the Chinese New Year celebration in China was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: She carefully placed the delicate china teacup on the saucer.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a beautiful collection of china plates.
meanings.sent3: Why did the plate go to the party in China? To show off its fine china!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of china figurines was as fragile as her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the china vase were truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A type of tree with pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cherry blossom tree is a type of china tree.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with the sweet fragrance of the china flowers.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bee buzz around the china tree? To collect nectar for its hive!
meanings.sent4: The petals of the china blossoms danced in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: Under the shade of the china tree, they enjoyed a peaceful picnic.
